solutionApps.name: Docs
solutionApps.description: AI-powered document editor with dual editor modes (Rich Text & Markdown), smart templates, and OpenAI integration for document generation and formatting

solutionApps.name: AI Recruiter
solutionApps.description: AI Recruiter  is a tool that helps you follow up with your interview candidates and prospects after the interview

solutionApps.name: AI Landing Page Generator
solutionApps.description: AI Landing Page Generator is an AI-powered service that streamlines the creation of high-converting landing pages. It intelligently extracts content from PDFs or other inputs, analyzes structure, and generates responsive, SEO-optimized landing pages in minutes—saving time, reducing manual effort, and enhancing marketing efficiency.

solutionApps.name: Blog Engine
solutionApps.description: AI-powered tool that helps you create high-quality, SEO-optimized articles in minutes. Whether you're a blogger, marketer, or business owner, generate keyword-rich content tailored for better search engine rankings — fast, easy, and effective.
